title: Bywater Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Bywater Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 3/4
ounces
aged rum
(Chris recommends Cruzan Single Barrel)
3/4
ounce
green Chartreuse
1/2
ounce
Averna
1/4
ounce
Velvet Falernum
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with cracked ice. Stir well for 20 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass or coupe.
Rum
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
